attributes.action: Make the 12th of July a bank holiday if England win Euro 2020
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen to bring the country together after a difficult 18 months and to show the national team the recognition they deserve.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make 12th of July a bank holiday if England win Euro 2020. I feel a national holiday is needed to celebrate winning this competition and to allow people to celebrate after 18 months of restrictions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
